key.name: exit-node
key.description: The country you want to connect from

key.name: socks-port
key.description: Local port on which Tractor would be listen

key.name: dns-port
key.description: Local port on which you would have an anonymous name server

key.name: http-port
key.description: Local port on which Tractor HTTP tunnel would be listen

key.name: pid
key.description: PID of the running Tractor proccess for user

key.name: bridge-type
key.description: Type of the tor bridge to use. It can be 0(none), 1(vanilla) or 2(obfs)

key.name: accept-connection
key.description: Whether or not allowing external devices to use this network
